title: Ticket #1063: cream_gahp segfaults on missing INITIALIZE_FROM_FILE file
description:
If you pass a non-existing file or directory to the cream_gahp's INITIALIZE_FROM_FILE, it dumps core. 

% ./cream_gahp   $GahpVersion: CREAM Dec 15 2009 UW\ Gahp $
INITIALIZE_FROM_FILE /tmp/monkeys_in_my_pants
Segmentation fault (core dumped)

Expected behavior: return "E" and continue on your way.

This is unlikely to be user facing, although it does complicate debugging things if the cert gets deleted for external reasons. It's a nuisance as a developer doing testing.

Further investigation suggests the build I'm using is broken in all cases, even valid certs.

RESOLVED: Merging work branch with latest master fixed.
creator: adesmet
